California Delightfully crisp with aromas of lemon & citrus, flavors of apple and pear mingle with a hint of oak
NAPA VALLEY, CA Tantalizing, vibrant aromas of Fuji apple, ripe pear and lemon zest. Orchard fruit and citrus flavors, refreshing acidity and hints of caramelized French oak

Central Coast, CA Aromas of lemon curd and honey, pineapple and ripe pear. Soft and balanced texture, with a slight hint of toasty oak. Complex without being heavy. Great with salmon, chicken, shrimp and salads
Lodi, CA Aromas of honeysuckle, guava and butter with a hint of toasty brioche bread. Lush flavors of ripe apricots, lychee, vanilla and flowers balanced by flavors of peaches and butter

menu.item_name: Riesling (Charles Smith Wines, Kung Fu Girl)
menu.description: Washington State White peach, mandarin orange and apricot are delivered with a core of minerality that makes this dry Riesling shimmer with energy and freshness.

menu.item_name: Riesling (Black Girl Magic, Mc Bride Sisters)
menu.description: California Intense aromas of honey, apricot, jasmine and tangerine followed by bright citrus and tropical flavors that hint of guava and pineapple. Softly sweet with a bright, tangy, mouthwatering finish A real food wine - perfect with fried chicken!

Columbia Valley, Washington State Perfect, off-dry summer blend of Muscat, Viognier, Riesling, Pinot Gris, Sauvignon Blanc & Chardonnay. Aromas of pineapple and honeysuckle lead to sweet flavors of white peach, dried papaya vanilla & key lime pie
CA Aromas of fresh plum, strawberry, and watermelon with layers of cherry and a hint of plum on the palate. Full bodied and full flavored - a favorite year after year.
California Ripe cherry and berry flavors. Silky in the mouth, good body, seductive wild cherries and a hint of sandalwood
California Deep red color, intense flavors of cherry and blackberry, hint of oak and a silky finish.

Napa Valley, California Concentrated fruit and spice with layers of red currant, cassis, cinnamon, vanilla and clove, along with hints of earthy forest floor. Predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with Petit Verdot, Malbec & Cabernet Franc
Paso Robles, CA Dark red fruits with spice and pepper notes on the palate with balancing acidity. Made from estate grown fruit aged in barrel for 12 months.

Napa Valley, CA, 2019 A Wine & Spirits Magazine Top 10 Chardonnay. Buttery richness to luscious spiced apple tart and baked pear flavors. Ground nutmeg lingers into the broad, plush finish with powerful toasty notes.

Sonoma County, CA, 2019 Exotic, vibrant and fresh. Full-flavored and well-balanced from a combination of stainless and French oak barrel treatment. Floral notes, honeydew melon, lemon and white pepper aromas with guava, mango & grapefruit on the palate.

Napa Valley, CA 2018 The benchmark for New World Merlot. Intense, complex, layered flavors. Aromas of huckleberry, black cherry, chocolate and fig. Voluptuous fruit and earthy undertones on the palate. A rich and remarkably long finish.

Sonoma County, CA 2018 Aromas of redcurrant, black olive tapenade, and hints of wet stone. Juicy red fruits burst on the palate with a youthful intensity, with balanced acidity, fine-grained tannins, and a lengthy finish. 90 PTS, Robert Parker, The Wine Advocate

OAK KNOLL DIST, NAPA 2018 nearly perfecta monumental wine Wine Enthusiast - Aromas of dense plum jam, currant, sage, hints of clove-scented leather. Layers of expressive, ripe cherry, cacao, and black fruit, rich mouthfeel, supple tannins.
NAPA VALLEY, CA 2018 Robust, balanced, complex - a blend of dark berry, generous oak notes, clove, and nutmeg. Supple, full-bodied with a punch of power, ripeness, and elegance from start to finish.

Our twist on the classic made with Dad's Hat Pennsylvania Rye Whiskey, Martell Cognac and a spritz of Absinthe. Served chilled, up, with a twist of lemon. The original Sazerac was crowned the official cocktail of New Orleans in 2008.
Uncle Nearest Small Batch Tennessee Whiskey, sarsaparilla syrup and lemon juice.
Empress 1908 Gin, ruby red grapefruit and lime juices, ginger beer and a twist of lime.
Bulleit Bourbon, fresh strawberries, strawberry jam and freshly squeezed lemon juice.

Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy 19 aromas of delicate lemon, lime and kiwi, fresh melon, honey and fig notes, wonderful balance of fruit and acidity

Burgundy, France Aromas and flavors of pink grapefruit, apple, and peach balanced with lighter brioche and floral notes, followed by a delightful zest.
Galicia, Spain A multi-layered nose of ripe citrus fruits, ginger, minerals, touch of smoke. Depth and energy on the palate framed nicely by juicy acidity.
Loire Valley, France Mineral and citrus flavors on the palate with bright acidity and a hint of fresh baked bread.
Rhne Valley, France A perfect introduction to orange wine. A natural white wine aged on the skins that is funky, fun, and wildly delicious
Deep and brilliant colour, with a fruity nose of cherry and plum. It is aromatically intense, medium bodied, with soft, fleshy texture on the palate.
Lodi, California 17 aroma of dark fruit, blackberries, ripe plums, fresh red raspberries, subtle pepper spice, barrel aged, 45 year old vines
Sonoma, California 17 dried cherries, black currants, rich plum, tanned leather, soft vanilla oak, medium to full bodied
Clarksburg, California 07 ruby-red color with fresh aromas of strawberry, raspberry, rhubarb and subtle pepper spice. This expressive wine is smooth and graceful on the palate flavors.
Eola-Amity, Oregon 16 fresh bramble berry flavors, pomegranate, and cherry fruit. The fruit is sourced from Willamette Valley, another mark of quality.
Tuscany, Italy NV Fruity and floral, with a good intensity, accompanied by light spicy notes. The right acidity extends the persistence of taste and enhances the flavor.

Finger Lakes, NY 17 A unique Cabernet Franc aged exclusively in stainless steel, resulting in an intensely fruit-forward wine. Tastes of dried cranberry and orange complement a satisfyingly smooth mouthfeel.
Mendoza, Argentina 19 red with violet nuances and one may find aromas of fresh cherries and strawberries
Barossa Valley, Australia Luscious and exotic aromas of cherry, boysenberry, hints of white pepper and violets framed by rose petals, chocolate and cherries.
